review:
Its manufactured by some other company.....marketed by levi's...the fabric
material is not that good. Only the levi's logo has cost.. otherwise its like
any other cotton tshirt that costs between rs 250-350.

The only concern most people must have about this tshirt is whether it is
original or not. Well its a totally original levi's product, no doubt there.
The fitting is awesome and the quality is good, not too great but considering
the price I think its as good as it gets. I got it for 499 and I'll recommend
others to buy it around that price if you can. Also the price on the tag is
899 not 999 so amazon should update that.
